FuncDef: This command configures last resort IP DNS addresses that can be used for name resolution by IPoE hosts (IA_NA, IA_PD and SLAAC) and PPPoE hosts (IA_NA, IA_PD and SLAAC).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address of the primary DNS server.
Specifies the IP address of the secondary DNS server (optional).
